spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent spatial alignment. Wall placement, door swings, and window locations match the 2D plan precisely. Only minor scaling variations in the bathroom fixtures.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation of generation constraints. The model is a top-down 2D floor plan recreation rather than a 3D isometric model. It also preserves all text labels and measurement lines from the original source.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture has been successfully rendered in its designated zones with high fidelity to the 2D symbols, including the balcony chairs and bedroom robes.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Failed the camera constraint. The view is top-down (2D plan style) instead of isometric orthographic. However, it maintains a clean, low-poly aesthetic with flat shading.

detected_errors.description: The render is a top-down 2D perspective instead of the required 3D isometric orthographic view.
The render contains original text labels (BALCONY, BATH, BED 4, etc.) and measurement indicators which were strictly prohibited.
